p.s: Amir Kapoor is a main character in the play Disgraced, Scene 3.
He is 40 years old and of South Asian origin.
He is a lawyer in a jewishJewish law-firm and that is why he pretends to be Hindu.
The extract starts with Amir and Jory entering the apartment.
Jory is in her mid 30s and is an African American lawyer at the same law-firm as Amir.
Jory just told him that she got a position, that Amir really wanted and deserved.
Jory is in the Apartmentapartment before him and as he enters enflamed (line 22) he yells at her.
You wait a week to tell me this?, he asks her angry.
She does not answer so he yells Who are you? in line 25.
Actually, he knows her but he is so disappointed that he asks that question.
In line 30, Jory asks Emily, ArmirsAmir's wife if she is having an affair with her husband, Isaac.
Are you having an affair with my husband?.
Emily is a white woman in her early 30s and Isaac is 40 and described as attractive.
He is a curator and Emily is an artisteartist.
To that question Amir reacts with Excuse me? in line 31, since that is the only thing Jory said, since Amir yelled at her.
Emily and Isaac both deny the accusations from Jory.
Amir does not say anything to them.
He is angry and turns to Jory full of hate and yells in line 18 on page 72 First you steal my job and now you try to destroy my marriage?You're fucking evil.After everything I've done for you?.
That shows that they had a connection and that Amir has helped her a lot and is really disappointed.
In line 22 he is going into a rage because Jory does not answer him the way he expects.
You have any idea how much of myself I've poured into that place?.
That underlines how hard he was trying to get the position that Jory got.
NooneNo one interrupts him, so he names all the reasons why he should have gotten the promotion.
After that Isaac insults him in line 31 by saying to Jory You don't need to listen to this asshole.
Amir just answers You're the asshole.
Isaac never really seemed to like Amir but now that he has a reason, he does not hesitate to insult him.
That is confirmed in line 33, when Isaac threatens Amir I'll knock you on your fucking ass!.
But in line 34 Amir, who does not seem to like Isaac either reacts with Try me!.
In the whole extract neither of them said something nice to or about eachothereach other.
In line 40 Amir spits in his face.
That is when Isaac says something racist in line 1 on page 73.
There's a reason they call you people animals and decides to leave (without his wife).
After Isaac left, Amir kicks Jory out.
She explains why she got promoted in line 7 it's impossible to trust you and leaves.
When Isaac and Jory left, Amir and Emily talk for the first time in the extract.
She yells at him for kicking Jory out but he gets weak and explains in line 19 She's right....
That is when Emily leaves her husband for a little while to get him a coffee.
After she comes back, AmirsAmir's mood changes and he asks her vulnerable Are you sleeping with him? (line 27).
Emily explains everything and is finally honest with Amir because he gets affected by what she says.
That is when Amir loosesloses control and the rage comes back.
Emily tries to calm him down in line 2 page 74 Emily [...] makes her way to him.
Amir hits Emily in the face and in rapid succession (line 7) he hits her more.
In the end he realises what he did and his last words in the extract are Oh my God....
So at first, Amir comes back with his colleguecolleague Jory and is angry, because she got promoted.
Then they find out that their partners are cheating on them.
Amir yells at everyone except his wife and when the guests (Isaac and Jory) leave, Amir loosesloses control and hits Emily until she realises what he is doing.
That shows how sensible Amir is and that his character and mood can change quickly.
